name: ASWebAuthenticationSessionRequest
desc: A login session request that a web browser receives from an app.

items.name: var url: URL
items.desc: The web address the browser should use to perform the authentication request.

items.name: var callbackURLScheme: String?
items.desc: The scheme the browser should use to return the result of the authentication attempt to the app requesting it.

items.name: var shouldUseEphemeralSession: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean that indicates whether the browser should use a private browsing session.

items.name: var uuid: UUID
items.desc: A unique identifier for the request.

items.name: func complete(withCallbackURL: URL)
items.desc: Indicates that the browser successfully completed the authentication attempt.

items.name: func cancelWithError(Error)
items.desc: Indicates that the browser canceled the authentication attempt.

items.name: var delegate: ASWebAuthenticationSessionRequestDelegate?
items.desc: A delegate that the session request instance informs about authentication completion.

items.name: protocol ASWebAuthenticationSessionRequestDelegate
items.desc: An interface through which the session request can inform its delegate, which is typically a browser, about the outcome of the authentication attempt.
